articles.author: David Lawder
articles.description: President Donald Trump has pushed into new trade law territory with an emergency sanctions law to justify punishing 25% tariffs on Canadian and Mexican imports and an extra 10% duty on Chinese goods to curb fentanyl and illegal immigration into the U.S.
articles.title: Trump stretches trade law boundaries with Canada, Mexico, China tariffs

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu prepared to leave Israel on Sunday for a meeting with U.S. President Donald Trump, looking to strengthen ties with Washington after tensions with the previous White House administration over the war in Gaza.
articles.title: Netanyahu leaves for Washington looking to deepen ties with Trump

articles.author: Erin Banco, Jonathan Landay
articles.description: Trump and his envoy for Ukraine and Russia, Keith Kellogg, have both said they are working on a plan to broker a deal to end the war but have offered few details about their strategy or when they might unveil such a plan.
articles.title: Exclusive: U.S. wants Ukraine to hold elections following a ceasefire, says Trump envoy

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday said he ordered military airstrikes on a senior Islamic State attack planner and others from the organization in Somalia.
articles.title: Trump says he ordered airstrikes on Islamic State in Somalia

articles.author: Rich McKay, Joseph Ax
articles.description: The Army said the soldier was Captain Rebecca Lobach, of Durham, North Carolina. She was an aviation officer in the regular Army since 2019 and assigned to the 12th Aviation Battalion, Fort Belvoir, Virginia.
articles.title: Soldier identified in DC plane crash, data shows helicopter may have been too high

articles.author: Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali
articles.description: Most days, crews like the one killed on Wednesday transport VIPs around Washington.
articles.title: Crashed US Army Black Hawk unit was responsible for doomsday readiness

articles.author: Brad Brooks
articles.description: Officials said they could not yet confirm how many people may have died on the ground.
articles.title: Medevac plane crashes in Philadelphia with child, 5 others on board

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu will start negotiations on the second phase of the Gaza ceasefire when he meets with U.S. President Donald Trump's Middle East Envoy, Steve Witkoff, on Monday in Washington, Netanyahu's office said late on Saturday.
articles.title: Israel's Netanyahu says negotiations start Monday for next phase of Gaza ceasefire

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The Palestinian militant group Hamas is expected to hand over three Israelis on Saturday, in the latest stage of a gradual exchange of hostages for Palestinian prisoners under a truce aimed at opening the way to ending the 15-month war in Gaza.
articles.title: Three Israeli hostages set to be released in latest Gaza exchange

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Greek authorities have advised people on the Aegean island of Santorini to shut schools on Monday, avoid two small ports and refrain from gathering in indoor spaces after increased seismic activity in the area over recent days.
articles.title: Greece issues Santorini seismic activity warning
